alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Hastings, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Marineland, Crescent Beach and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
